meaningMnemonic: Sometimes someone will <kanji>appear</kanji> before you and it's <kanji>clear</kanji> they're worth <vocabulary>honoring</vocabulary>. If Koichi appeared before you, for example, it should be pretty clear what you should do.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
